title: User Profile
confirmNav: There are unsaved changes on this page. Do you want to leave the page and discard your changes?

usernamePolicy.textLine1: The user name can contain small and capital letters, but a user cannot have multiple accounts with case mismatch
usernamePolicy.textLine2: Every character in user name must be one of : a-z, A-Z, 0-9, _, -, .
usernamePolicy.textLine3: The user name cannot match with invalid names.
usernamePolicy.infoPopup: Invalid names: ., .., root, bin, daemon, adm, lp, sync, shutdown, halt, mail, news, uucp, operator, games, gopher, ftp, nobody, rpm, vcsa, dbus, ntp, canna, nscd, rpc, postfix, mailman, named, amanda, postgres, exim, sshd, rpcuser, nsfnobody, pvm, apache, xfs, gdm, htt, mysql, webalizer, mailnull, smmsp, squid, ldap, netdump, pcap, radiusd, radvd, quagga, wnn, dovecot, litp-admin, saslauth, nfsnobody, ovirtagent, cloud-user, tcpdump, haproxy, enmadm, jboss_user, nslcd, ssouser, ldapapplicationuser, npamuser.

passwordAgeingPolicy.textLine2: Expiration warning ranges from 0 to 14 days
